main event: An unidentified object was observed in Arlington, Va, on June 14, 1955, displaying characteristics similar to a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes and 12 seconds,The object had no identifiable shape and appeared as a ball with no visible exhaust or tail,No sound was detected during the observation,The object's speed fluctuated moderately during the sighting,The conclusion reached was that the object was probably a balloon.
sighted object: an unidentified object resembling a balloon
witness description: An observer, likely an astronomer, reported the sighting with details of the object's trajectory.
